definition.en-GB: A social gathering of invited guests, often involving eating, drinking, dancing or the playing of games
definition.en-US: A social gathering of invited guests, often involving eating, drinking, dancing or the playing of games
definition.pt-BR: Evento social que reúne pessoas convidadas, geralmente com comida, bebida, dança ou jogos.
definition.pt-PT: Evento social que reúne pessoas convidadas, geralmente com comida, bebida, dança ou jogos.
definition.se: Sammankomst med riklig förtäring av god mat och dryck, för deltagarnas nöje, ibland med dans.
definition.zh-Hans: 邀请客人参加的社交聚会，通常包括吃饭、喝酒、跳舞或玩游戏
